en.meta.title: Chen Jia Â· AI Applied Scientist
en.meta.description: Chen Jia, MS in AI, focused on machine learning engineering, data products, and multimodal applications.
en.notice.jsWarning: ğŸŒ Enable JavaScript if the language has not switched automatically.
en.hero.eyebrow: AI Applied Scientist Â· ML Engineer
en.hero.title: Hi, Iâ€™m Chen Jia.
en.hero.summary: M.Eng. in AI candidate at NUS building multimodal systems, productizing LLM features, and automating data science workflows. I turn data into production-ready intelligent products that drive measurable value.
en.hero.snapshot.title: Tech Snapshot
en.hero.snapshot.item3: TurtleBot3 robotics Â· ROS Â· SLAM
en.hero.quote: â€œData + creativity = AI products that keep delivering impact.â€
en.about.title: About
en.about.subtitle: I love turning complex models into experiences everyone can benefit from.
en.about.strengths.title: Strengths
en.about.strengths.item1: Design end-to-end product strategies that embed AI into workflows
en.about.strengths.item2: Ship MVPs fast with rigorous model validation
en.about.strengths.item3: Product mindset with collaborative cross-functional delivery
en.about.stack.title: Toolbox
en.about.experience.title: Internships & Teams
en.about.experience.item1: Computer vision in industrial scenarios with multimodal interaction and behavior analytics
en.about.experience.item2: LLM automation pipelines for data-driven operations and root-cause analysis
en.about.experience.item3: Embodied robotics development with manipulation tasks
en.about.awards.title: Awards & Certifications
en.about.awards.item1: 2023 Microsoft Azure AI Hackathon Â· 2nd place (China)
en.experience.title: Education
en.experience.subtitle: Interdisciplinary background grounding AI product execution with business insight.
en.experience.nus.title: M.Eng. in AI Â· National University of Singapore
en.experience.nus.desc: Coursework in machine reasoning, pattern recognition, intelligent perception, text analytics, autonomous robotics, and human-machine systems.
en.experience.nuc.title: B.Eng. in Software Engineering Â· North University of China
en.experience.nuc.desc: Studied programming fundamentals, data structures and algorithms, database systems, web design, big data analytics, and data warehousing.
en.experience.edu.role: M.Eng. in AI Â· Shanghai Jiao Tong University
en.experience.edu.desc: GPA 3.8/4.0. Focused on ML systems, data mining, and cloud-native architectures. Research assistant in the AI Innovation Lab exploring multimodal behavior understanding.
en.experience.edu.item2: Team lead for CampusFlow LLM guide, 1.2K DAU
en.experience.bytedance.desc: Built semantic retrieval and evaluation pipelines for an enterprise knowledge QA product.
en.experience.bytedance.item1: Designed RAG pipeline boosting recall by 21%
en.experience.bytedance.item2: Automated evaluation reduced testing time by 60%
en.experience.tencent.role: Data Science Intern Â· Tencent Cloud
en.experience.tencent.desc: Built time-series forecasting + self-supervised anomaly detection for cloud monitoring.
en.experience.tencent.item1: Explainable alert console lowered noise by 35%
en.experience.tencent.item2: GPU utilization forecasts saved 12% compute cost
en.projects.title: Internships & Team Projects
en.projects.subtitle: Self-driven experimentation and fast iterationâ€”ship prototypes quickly and validate with real data.
en.projects.smartBin.aria: Smart mobile trash bin â€“ robotics system
en.projects.smartBin.title: Smart Mobile Trash Bin â€“ Robotics System
en.projects.smartBin.desc: Indoor service robot delivering autonomous navigation, obstacle avoidance, waste sorting, and remote management.
en.projects.smartBin.item1: TurtleBot3 deployed with ROS and SLAM for localization
en.projects.smartBin.item2: Robust autonomous navigation in dynamic indoor environments
en.projects.smartBin.item3: Sensor fusion (vision / infrared) streaming through TCP/IP for remote monitoring
en.projects.roboticArm.title: Robotic Arm Grasping Practice
en.projects.roboticArm.desc: Reinforcement learning for embodied manipulation, from simulation to grasping irregular objects.
en.projects.roboticArm.item1: PyTorch + Gazebo + MoveIt! based simulation platform
en.projects.roboticArm.item2: TurtleBot3 with OpenManipulator-X arm handling varied scenes
en.projects.roboticArm.item3: Designed joint velocity control and gripper open/close commands
en.projects.safetyVision.title: Safety Behavior Detection â€“ Vision for Industrial Sites
en.projects.safetyVision.desc: Real-time detection of falls, missing hard hats, and other high-risk behaviors with proactive alerts.
en.projects.safetyVision.item1: YOLOv8 pose + detection with Flask service and OPC UA integration
en.projects.safetyVision.item2: Closed-loop pipeline linking perception, understanding, and device actions
en.projects.safetyVision.item3: Multimodal algorithms for behavior analytics and scene interaction
en.projects.defect.title: Surface Defect Inspection System
en.projects.defect.desc: Low-cost real-time inspection that classifies surface defects and reduces manual workload.
en.projects.defect.item1: Labelled real component data and fine-tuned YOLO on defect samples
en.projects.defect.item2: Deployed with OPC UA protocol on Raspberry Pi endpoints
en.projects.automation.title: LLM Orchestration & Automation
en.projects.automation.desc: Harnessed large models to streamline repetitive workflows and boost productivity.
en.projects.automation.item1: Dify-powered invoice automation with open-source LLMs and prompt iteration
en.projects.automation.item2: Gemini API + OpenCV to extract frames, read text, and publish multi-language docs
en.projects.youtube.title: YouTube Comment Analytics â€“ Multimodal LLM & NLP
en.projects.youtube.desc: Multimodal analysis platform solving feedback discovery with topic modeling, sentiment, and spam filtering.
en.projects.youtube.item1: Scraped large-scale YouTube comments for raw datasets
en.projects.youtube.item2: Fine-tuned RoBERTa, BART, and other models
en.projects.youtube.item3: Delivered topic modeling, entity-level sentiment, and spam classification
en.projects.youtube.item4: Built Streamlit dashboards for creator insights
en.projects.consumer.title: Consumer Analytics & Behavior Forecasting
en.projects.consumer.desc: End-to-end AI analytics platform uncovering mall consumption insights.
en.projects.consumer.item1: EDA plus decision trees, K-Means, genetic algorithm, and DWA techniques
en.projects.consumer.item2: Delivered segmentation, personas, high-value identification, revenue and anomaly analysis
en.projects.consumer.item3: Interactive Streamlit visualizations showcasing reports and predictions
en.projects.campusflow.title: CampusFlow LLM Assistant
en.projects.campusflow.desc: GPT-4 powered campus knowledge assistant covering courses, admin processes, and reminders.
en.projects.campusflow.item1: LangChain + Weaviate RAG for context-aware reasoning
en.projects.campusflow.item2: Function calling closes the loop with campus APIs
en.projects.insightlens.title: InsightLens Multimodal Retrieval
en.projects.insightlens.desc: Search platform for marketing teams with blended text-image search and trend insights.
en.projects.insightlens.item1: CLIP + BLIP2 alignment delivers cross-modal recall
en.projects.autoops.title: AutoOps Time-series Monitoring
en.projects.autoops.desc: AutoML-powered cloud monitoring platform delivering explainable anomaly alerts for SREs.
en.projects.autoops.item1: Prophet + LSTM hybrid with automated tuning
en.insights.title: Industry Pulse Â· Currently Tracking
en.insights.subtitle: Weekly picks of papers, open-source drops, and market moves to stay sharp.

en.insights.card1.desc: Studying self-generated dialogues to calibrate tool orchestration bias.

en.project.campusflow.meta.title: CampusFlow LLM Assistant Â· Case Study
en.project.campusflow.meta.description: CampusFlow LLM assistant project case: design, architecture, and outcomes.
en.project.campusflow.hero.title: CampusFlow LLM Assistant
en.project.campusflow.hero.summary: GPT-4 powered campus knowledge assistant connecting to institutional APIs to streamline course, admin, and activity workflows for students.
en.project.campusflow.hero.m1: MVP in 2 weeks, soft launch in 3 weeks
en.project.campusflow.hero.m3: Function calling integrated with registrar & calendar APIs
en.project.campusflow.hero.m4: Automated eval loop validating answer quality
en.project.campusflow.hero.quote: â€œConversational AI connects students to real campus services.â€
en.project.campusflow.impact.subtitle: Drove the project from discovery to production deployment with measurable outcomes.
en.project.campusflow.impact.card1.title: Customer Insight
en.project.campusflow.impact.card1.item1: Interviewed 60+ students, mapped layered information needs
en.project.campusflow.impact.card2.title: Product Design
en.project.campusflow.impact.card2.item2: â€œTask cardâ€ UX to orchestrate multi-step instructions
en.project.campusflow.impact.card2.item3: Operational dashboard tracking recall, latency, feedback
en.project.campusflow.impact.card3.title: Business Impact
en.project.campusflow.impact.card3.item3: 12 student clubs integrated custom plugins via open API
en.project.campusflow.gallery.subtitle: Motion captures of core user journeys from course matching to admin tasks.
en.project.campusflow.gallery.card1.title: Course Matching
en.project.campusflow.gallery.card1.desc: Recommends optimal schedules based on major, interests, and completed classes, then syncs to calendar.
en.project.campusflow.gallery.card2.title: Event Suggestions
en.project.campusflow.gallery.card2.desc: Combines student profiles with club data to push personalized events via webhooks.
en.project.campusflow.tech.subtitle: End-to-end architecture from ingestion to evaluation.
en.project.campusflow.tech.card1.title: RAG + Tooling Loop
en.project.campusflow.tech.card1.desc: Weaviate collections per scenario with hybrid retrieval; FastAPI tool gateway orchestrates registrar, calendar, and club services.
en.project.campusflow.tech.card1.item2: Auto tool eval with GPT-4 feedback tuning
en.project.campusflow.tech.card1.item3: Async job queue to handle peak loads
